subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The rookie Kason Gabbard pitched a three-hitter for Boston’s second shutout of the season and the host Red Sox beat the Kansas City Royals, 4-0, last night with the help of three home runs.
snippet: The rookie Kason Gabbard pitched a three-hitter for Boston’s second shutout of the season and the host Red Sox beat the Kansas City Royals, 4-0, last night with the help of three home runs.
